resources.string: ingredient (1) sifted cake flour ingredient (2) granulated sugar ingredient (3) baking powder ingredient (4) salt ingredient (5) vanilla extract, divided ingredient (6) egg yolks ingredient (7) whole milk ingredient (8) unsalted butter, softened and cut into 1 in. cubes ingredient (9) egg whites ingredient (10) melted and cooled bittersweet or semisweet chocolate
